title: Pizzeria Vesuvio
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Ask for the vegan menu. In addition to vegan dishes it is also possible to order farinata (a vegan chickpea flour cake) and pizza without cheese, or a pizza with vegan cheese and vegan salami.
streetAddress: Via Camillo Benso Conte di Cavour, 94
